uri.description: The URI of the configuration entity

accounting_mode.description: Accounting Mode - If set as AMO_NONE then sets default value for both accounting_mode and accounting_method

accounting_method.description: Accounting Method - If set as AME_NONE then sets default value for both accounting_mode and accounting_method

server_group.description: Server group name - server_group is not supported  when accounting_method is AME_TACACS
